mods:titleInfo.mods:title: April 17, 1985 a date with equality button

mods:name.mods:namePart: Canada Advisory Council of the Status of Women

mods:mods.mods:abstract: Image consists of one round, grey, metal button. In the background there is an image of a female profile. At the top white text reads:"April 17, 1985". Below that, in uppercase, blue text reads:"A date". The next line reads:"With equality". Below this an image of the female symbol appears beside the text:"Canadian Advisory Council of the Status of Women".

mods:subject.mods:topic: Canadian Charter of Rights and Freedoms
